title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on KD's Baffling Mistake, Pats Insider Tom Curran on Mac Mania & Belichick's Post-Brady Revival
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on KD's Baffling Mistake, Pats Insider Tom Curran on Mac Mania & Belichick's Post-Brady Revival
description:
Colin dives into why Kevin Durant-to-the-Nets is becoming the weirdest decision in sports history (3:00), why Zac Taylor's gambling comments haven't raised a single eyebrow (7:00), and the major statement Michigan State made by giving Mel Tucker a huge contract (9:00). Then - one of Colin's favorite guests - Patriots Insider Tom Curran of NBC Sports Boston comes on to discuss why Mac Jones' early success took him by surprise (13:00), why Belichick's system has bounced back (15:00), what the Patriots' offense is still missing (25:00), how much the Pats regretted letting Brady get away (28:00), the reason why the Falcons are already outmatched for their Thursday game against New England (30:00), why Belichick's competitors are actually making his job easier (32:00), the worst possible matchup for the Patriots (34:00), and what Brady and Belichick might say to each other today (37:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
